fixes.name: Profit Ratio
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau aggregation SUM([Profit])/SUM([Sales]) to DAX by qualifying columns with the table name: SUM('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit]) / SUM('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Sales]). Preserved the original aggregation logic.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation uses aggregation (SUM), so it should be created as a measure.
